title: LF Odyssey Team To Complete Onslaught Missions
body:
If anyone wants a team to complete the Onslaught missions than add me or comment below. Would prefer if you have already beatean the Onslaught level.

I currently have to complete these missions:
- Clear Onslaught with all 5 people playing as the same character
- Clear Onslaught with all 5 people playing as either Ziggs or Sona
- Clear Onslaught as a team without Sona or Ziggs, and only 1 Jinx
- Clear Onslaught with each person having 4 or fewer Augments equipped
- Clear Onslaught with each person having 3 or fewer Augments equipped
- Clear Onslaught with each person having 2 or fewer Augments equipped 

Add me or comment below if interested.

replies.body: would certainly be keen for some of those, only have the 5 yasuo game unlocked atm though
would recommend going into an easier lvl, perhaps into and asking teammates, near impossible in onslaught

hi

i really want help with the mission can u help me ?
i have the 2 aug mission left but cant find a team to help me and have played like 25 games now with random people and cant make it

Have cleared all other missions
but i have my account in west can u still help me ?
Im down to do them add me
im keen if you're keen and add me on all night tonight :D
